Changelog
=========

1.2.1 (2012-07-05)
------------------

- Added permission for toggling social-buttons option
  [andreas_stocker]

1.2.0 (2012-05-10)
------------------

- Added support for LinkedIn
  [andreas_stocker]
- Using HTML5 compatible buttons
  [andreas_stocker]
- Plone 4.1 compatible
  [andreas_stocker]

1.1.1 (2012-01-03)
------------------

- Remove quotes from cookies before adding value to a JSON string
  [andreas_stocker]

1.1.0 (2011-11-09)
------------------

- Added support for 2-click-buttons
  [andreas_stocker]
- Added OpenGraph description meta tag
  [andreas_stocker]

1.0.0 (2010-03-27)
------------------

- Initial version (not public)
  [andreas_stocker]
